original_text: When the centurion heard about Jesus, he sent to him elders of the Jews, asking him to come and heal his servant.
korean_text: 예수의 소문을 듣고 유대인의 장로 몇 사람을 예수께 보내어 오셔서 그 종을 구해 주시기를 청한지라

sentences.original_text: When the centurion heard about Jesus
he sent to him elders of the Jews
asking him to come and heal his servant.
